ComicInfo.Title: First Time; Ringing Up Baby; Nikki, The CHiPmunk; A Big Surprise; The Feedstore Conversion; No Such Critter

ComicInfo.Summary:
First Time: A ram brags to his horse friend about his first sexual encounter.
Ringing Up Baby: A man Cadence met at the club the previous evening calls her up for a date, but gets cold feet while waiting for her to pick up.
Nikki, The CHiPmunk: Nikki pulls over a redneck in a pickup for speeding, then decides to dispense some roadside justice.
A Big Surprise: Brother and sister cats get their younger sister a well-endowed bull for her birthday.
The Feedstore Conversion: Three primates discuss the evolution of sexual harassment over the years while one tries to buy cat chow.
No Such Critter: An examination of what each sex is looking for in a mate.
